data: Marocco | Moors | Jews | Arabs | West Barbary

Our scene is in Marocco, and the reader will, I trust, pardon details of dress and scenery which may appear tedious, but are necessary in the delineation of the manners and customs of a people who, though so close at our doors, are so little known as the Moors, Jews, and Arabs of West Barbary.
The Arab's Pledge: A Tale of Marocco in 1830
